How to create a fairy tale?
Come up with a name and choose\n a cover for your fairy tale
Players make their moves in turns.\n and can only come up with one sentence

The game can be played by 2 to 8 people.
 - Players make their moves in turns.
 - The order is determined in the beginning of the game and corresponds to the order in which the players were added to the game.
 - A player can come up with only one sentence.
 - The sentence is limited to 60 characters.
 - Any player can finish the game after each of the participants in the game has made at least 1 move.

 There are 3 difficulty modes int the game:
 1. Easy. All previously composed sentences are visible to all participants in the game at any time.
 2. Medium. The player sees only the last sentence composed by the player before him.
 3. Hard. The player sees only the last sentence composed by the player before him. In his turn the player must use the randomly generated mandatory word.
